mainfeatures: 2.7" TFT LCD CMOS HD display 16.0 Mega pixels effectual resolution 4x digital zoom 5x optical zoom 5.0MP CMOS sensor Built-in rechargeable lithium battery With flash light Support video recording
specifications: Model: DC-800 Image sensor: 16Mega Pixel /5.0MP CMOS sensor Image Resolution: 4608 x 3456 pixels (16MP), 4480 x 33600 pixels (15MP), 4000x3000 (12MP), 3648x2736 (10MP), 3456x2592 (9MP), 3648x2048 (7MP), 2592x1944 (5MP), 2048x1536 (3MP), 1920x1080 (2MP), 640x480 (VGA) Video resolution: 1280x720 pixels (30fps), 640x480 pixels (30fps), 320x240 pixels (30fps) LCD Display: 2.7'' TFT ISO: Auto/100/200/400 External memory: SD Card (up to 32 GB) Zoom: 5x optical zoom, 4x digital zoom Exposure: ~3.0EV~+3.0EV White balance: Auto /daylight/cloudy/incandescent/fluorescent Scene: Auto/night portrait/night, scenery/portrait/scenery/sport/party/beach, High sensitivity Focus mode: 2mins, 5mins, 10mins File format: JPEG (Still image)/AVI(Video) Flash: YES. IGBT (auto/force/red eye reduction/off) Pictbridge: Yes Interface: USB 2.0 Anti-shake: Yes Face detect: Yes System requirements: Window2000xp/Vista/7/Mac OS x (10.5.x Or higher) Battery: Lithium battery Dimensions: 91*26*20mm Color: Silver/Black/Red/Blue
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camera 1 x USB cable 1 x Lithium-ion battery 1 x Battery charger 1 x CD disk 1 x User manual
